title: Amélie
writer: Guillaume Laurant (scenario), Jean-Pierre Jeunet (scenario), Guillaume Laurant (dialogue)
actors: Audrey Tautou, Mathieu Kassovitz, Rufus, Lorella Cravotta
plot: Amélie is an innocent and naive girl in Paris with her own sense of justice. She decides to help those around her and, along the way, discovers love.
awards: Nominated for 5 Oscars. Another 56 wins & 61 nominations.
